subtitle: Brand sites to delight and excite prospective EV customers
description: Chevrolet electric is a marketing website to showcase the latest electric vehicles customers can purchase or preorder from General Motors. The site was built using TypeScript, React, NextJS, and Strapi.

images.alt: Chevrolet Electric Bolt EUV 2023 Hero section
Chevrolet Electric request information leads form

subtitle: Custom built website generation tool
description: Ultra Compose is an initiative to build a custom website creation solution (similar to SquareSpace or Wix) designed with the General Motors business needs in mind. Built With React, TypeScript, React Query, Quarkus, and Jotai. Since it is an in-house tool I cannot provide images.  Photo above is by Ketut Subiyanto.

subtitle: Graphic design portfolio website
description: LSR Creative is a graphic design portfolio website I built for my wife. The website was built it using JavaScript, React, NextJS, GraphQL and GraphCMS.

subtitle: Mock movie review website
description: This is my first project using Java and Spring Boot. It's very basic but was a lot of fun and exciting to work with a new programming language.
urlLabel: Kendall Rundquist's Full-Stack Movie Review Website

subtitle: Auto played solitaire game
description: This was a side project I put together to work on my knowledge of TypeScript/JavaScript and OOP. I really wanted to challenge myself by working on something that could showcase my TypeScript/JavaScript knowledge.

subtitle: Metroidvania game developed by following HeartBeast's tutorial
description: This was a tutorial I had wanted to take for a long time. I have a huge passion for games and this tutorial was a lot of fun. I learned a lot about Godot and the GDScript language.
